Title: User Authentication
Description: Implement sign-up, login, logout, password reset using email verification and JWT tokens.

Title: Product Browsing
Description: Allow users to view product listings by category, apply filters (price, rating), and search by keyword.

Title: Cart Management
Description: Enable users to add, remove, and update quantities in their shopping cart. Persist cart across sessions.

Title: Secure Checkout
Description: Integrate a payment gateway (Stripe) to process credit card payments securely and confirm purchase.

Title: Order History
Description: Display past orders with status (pending, shipped, delivered) and details per order.

Title: Admin Product Management
Description: Allow admin users to create, edit, delete, and publish products in the catalog.
